metadata.title: CVE-2021-42550 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In logback version 1.2.7 and prior versions, an attacker with the requiredprivileges to edit configurations files could craft a maliciousconfiguration allowing to execute arbitrary code loaded from LDAP servers.

criterions.comment: logback package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
